title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
items.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

items.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.title: Move over, Mariah: Michael Bublé is becoming the king of Christmas music with nearly $16 million in holiday earnings
items.description: “Bublé has been a busy little elf,” music-industry experts note

items.title: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived
items.description: “If you have never found yourself in a situation where your life does a complete 180, it’s wrong to talk down to anyone.”

items.title: For investors, the real gift from Wall Street comes a day after Christmas
items.description: For the S&P 500, Dec. 26 has historically been the most reliably positive day of the year.

items.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
items.description: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world.

items.title: This discount retailer thrived in 2025 despite a volatile backdrop. Why that momentum can continue in 2026
items.description: The company hit an all-time high earlier in December, and the stock is up more than 19% — outpacing the S&P 500's 17% advance.

items.title: A rotation into value stocks from growth could grow stronger in the new year
items.description: Value stocks have enjoyed a late-year resurgence, after underperforming earlier in 2025.

items.title: This convenience store chain is in a long-term upward trend with no signs of slowing, charts show
items.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the charts on this convenience store stock ahead of 2026.

items.title: The blowout AI trades that surprised Wall Street in 2025
items.description: We lay out the AI trades that captured the market's attention, from Google's unexpected growth to the boom in rocket companies and self-driving cars.
